name: Kingdom of animals Demo
description:
The Demo of our first game. In the Demo are over 10 different animals and one landscape. In our full version, which will hopfully release soon, there will be much more landscapes and more then 75 animals. Additionally we work on a special attack and an instuction in the menu.

Gameover sound: GTA copyrightfree

Coin sound: old Minecraft sound copyrightfree
